Uses of Class
io.netty.handler.codec.compression.DeflateOptions

Packages that use DeflateOptions
Package
Description
io.netty.handler.codec.compression
Encoder and decoder which compresses and decompresses ByteBufs in a compression format such as zlib, gzip, and Snappy.

  • Uses of DeflateOptions in io.netty.handler.codec.compression

    Subclasses of DeflateOptions in io.netty.handler.codec.compression
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    final class 
    GzipOptions
    GzipOptions holds DeflateOptions.compressionLevel(), DeflateOptions.memLevel() and DeflateOptions.windowBits() for Gzip compression.
    Methods in io.netty.handler.codec.compression that return DeflateOptions
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static DeflateOptions
    StandardCompressionOptions.deflate()
    Default implementation of DeflateOptions with compressionLevel set to 6, windowBits set to 15 and memLevel set to 8.
